about.text: Hello there! My name is Miguel Nava a software developer passionate. Few days ago I finished successfully my career B.S. in Computer Systems Engineering, graduated from ITESA, to be exact, I concluded it in October, 2021 and I'm really excited to start my career and grow professionally. Feel free to navigate in this website and look at the technologies than I've used or see the public projects where I have collaborated. Finally if you're interested in me, you can take a look to my resume below. Regards!
